PAD_VoiceReaction.synopsis: Party reacts to Shar's voice in the temple and acknowledging it is Shar's voice.
PAD_VoiceReaction.how_to_trigger: 1. Approach the shar statue at -754; -6; -753 in SCL_Main1.a Or trigger any other voice of shar moment in SHA2. Wait for Shar AD to finish3. VB plays.

AD_TrialIntro.synopsis: A disembodied voice speaks from a nearby statue. It tells the player that they have arrived at the trial area
AD_TrialIntro.how_to_trigger: Walk near the statue at the start of the trial area - only triggers if the palyer has not already started a trial

AD_Baptism.synopsis: A disembodied voice congratulates the player for reaching the entrance the inner sanctum of the Shar Temple. It urges the player too step into the water for their final test
AD_Baptism.how_to_trigger: Arrive at the entrannce to Nightsong's Prison

AD_Welcome.synopsis: The player is welcomed to the Shar Temple by a disembodied voice
AD_Welcome.how_to_trigger: Played opens the Oathkeeper's Gate at the start of Shar Temple

AD_ProgressionCommentary.synopsis: The disembodied voice of the Shar Temple comments on the player's progress. Nodes can be played in any sequence
AD_ProgressionCommentary.how_to_trigger: Walk past certain statues in the Shar Temple in the Shar Temple after completing a trial or killing the Orthon

PAD_VoiceReaction_0.speaker: Player
PAD_VoiceReaction_0.text: A voice... is that Shar herself, who speaks...?

AD_TrialIntro_0.text: Nothing of value comes easy. Overcome my trials, and win my embrace.

AD_Baptism_0.text: The end draws near. You show great potential - do not falter now.

AD_Baptism_2.text: One more test awaits. Descend to the Nightsong. Make a sacrifice. Rise again a Dark Justiciar.

AD_Baptism_1.text: You persevere, though you struggled in my trials. Admirable, perhaps.

AD_Welcome_0.text: Welcome, child. Follow my voice, and prove your worth.

AD_ProgressionCommentary_0.text: A poor effort. Perhaps you are not worthy of my embrace, child.

AD_ProgressionCommentary_1.text: The first trial completed. The first sign you are worthy. Continue - do not fail me.

AD_ProgressionCommentary_2.text: You have triumphed at every turn. Seek out my inner sanctum - the final test awaits.
